name: Vasilis demo - welcome into the riot
name_original: Vasilis demo - welcome into the riot
description:
Vasilis is a hand-drawn adventure game. The main character – Vasilis, lost her husband – Peter, in the rebellious city center. The city is in riots for a long time and almost everyday something burns or someone dies.

The government left the center, which was dominated by local workers and students, who were able to build 4 towers that prevent people in the center from death.
"Vasilis - welcome into the riot" is a demo version. You can check Vasilis page on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1002200/Vasilis/
